Text.val: 13.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
17.05.2004 SH SCR6237 Added new field to table DEBB_ACTINVAH
13.01.2004 SH SCR5267 Reduced selection of DEBC rows with DEBC_DATDELETED = NULL
20.03.2003 RR SCR3195 -> Implementation of shortcut handling
-- If only 1 record exist, than the OutputParameters are automaticliy
-- filled, with the values of this record, otherwise the selection-

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1 where DEBC_DEBC= ':2' and DEBC_ADMNO = :3 and DEBC_CLNTNO = :4 and DEBC_DATDELETED IS NULL for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
select DEBC_DEBH from :1 where DEBC_DEBC= ':2' and DEBC_ADMNO = :3 and DEBC_CLNTNO = :4 and DEBC_DATDELETED IS NULL for fetch only
